product_name: ExOfficio Sol Cool Ultimate Hoodie - Women's
long_description: Traveling to hot, sunny climes? Stay comfortable in the women's ExOfficio Sol Cool Ultimate Hoodie, with its UPF 50+ sun protection rating and Icefil technology to keep you cool. Stretchy polyester/spandex fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly. Icefil technology attaches Xylitol to fibers; Xylitol cools surface temperature up to 5 degrees by moving moist body heat to the surface where it evaporates quickly. Xylitol, found naturally in birch trees and other plants, also offers antimicrobial properties to manage odor. Mesh underarm panels enhance ventilation. Full-coverage 3-panel scuba-style hood features cooling back vents and drawcord ties. Thumbholes in cuffs let you cover the backs of your hands to protect them from harmful UV rays. Side cinch ties can create gathers for a soft look; flatlock seams feel comfortable next to skin. ExOfficio Sol Cool Ultimate Hoodie for women features a zippered security pocket for essentials.
short_description: Traveling to hot, sunny climes? Stay comfortable in the women's ExOfficio Sol Cool Ultimate Hoodie, with its UPF 50+ sun protection rating and Icefil technology to keep you cool.
